comments.content: never been there before... can be my next vacation candidate. which dialect they use in Macau? Cantonese?

first.content: Macau is a great vacation spot for me. There are a lot entertainment element like casinos, yummy foods and shows. Actually most of people in Macau are good at Cantonese, Chinese(mandarin) and English. So u don't have to worry about language.😁
first.name: 滴滴

comments.content: Seems like you also visited Studio City. The 8-shape ferris wheel is interesting though you may not find great view from there.

first.content: Exactly, it was hard to find great view there haha.😂 I do love to trip to Macau but HK is my first priority.😁 two of my hobbies are watching HK movies and listening to HK music. Also I love food in HK more than Macau. Especially 翠華茶餐廳.🍴😄
first.name: 滴滴

first.content: Glad to hear that you like HK and guess you should be quite good in Cantonese (listening at least?), but beware 翠華 could be an expensive choice LOL
